item.title: Messi-included-in-Barca-squad-for-Bayern-Munich
item.description: World Player of the Year Lionel Messi has been included in the Barcelona squad for the first-leg of their Champions League semi-final against Bayern Munich on Tuesday.
item.itunes:subtitle: World Player of the Year Lionel Messi has been included in the Barcelona squad for the first-leg of their Champions League semi-final against Bayern Munich on Tuesday.
item.itunes:summary: World Player of the Year Lionel Messi has been included in the Barcelona squad for the first-leg of their Champions League semi-final against Bayern Munich on Tuesday.

item.title: Kebede-wins-London-Marathon-amid-tight-security
item.description: Tsegaye Kebede won the London Marathon for the second time today amid enhanced security in the first major race since the twin bombings in Boston.

item.title: When-Tendulkar-met-Sir-Viv-at-Kotla
item.description: It did not take long for Sachin Tendulkar and Sir Vivian Richards to strike a warm conversation at the Ferozeshah Kotla in New Delhi today.
item.itunes:subtitle: It did not take long for Sachin Tendulkar and Sir Vivian Richards to strike a warm conversation at the Ferozeshah Kotla in New Delhi today.
item.itunes:summary: It did not take long for Sachin Tendulkar and Sir Vivian Richards to strike a warm conversation at the Ferozeshah Kotla in New Delhi today.

item.title: Vivian-Richards-advises-Daredevils-to-have-faith
item.description: Delhi Daredevils had a piece of advice from the team's new ambassador-cum-advisor Sir Vivian Richards, who said the beleaguered outfit must "have faith" and be "solid in mind" in the rest of their matches in the ongoing T20 league.
item.itunes:subtitle: Delhi Daredevils had a piece of advice from the team's new ambassador-cum-advisor Sir Vivian Richards, who said the beleaguered outfit must "have faith" and be "solid in mind" in the rest of their matches in the ongoing T20 league.
item.itunes:summary: Delhi Daredevils had a piece of advice from the team's new ambassador-cum-advisor Sir Vivian Richards, who said the beleaguered outfit must "have faith" and be "solid in mind" in the rest of their matches in the ongoing T20 league.

item.title: Boston-tributes-tight-security-at-London-Marathon
item.description: Security was tight for the London Marathon today as thousands of runners paid solemn tribute to the victims of the deadly bomb attacks at the Boston Marathon barely a week ago.

item.title: Mumbai-Indians-score-161-as-Rohit-Sharma-slams-73
item.description: Opting to bat first, Mumbai Indians scored 161 for four with Rohit Sharma scoring a blistering 73 runs in their Twenty 20 match against Delhi Daredevils in New Delhi today.
item.itunes:subtitle: Opting to bat first, Mumbai Indians scored 161 for four with Rohit Sharma scoring a blistering 73 runs in their Twenty 20 match against Delhi Daredevils in New Delhi today.
item.itunes:summary: Opting to bat first, Mumbai Indians scored 161 for four with Rohit Sharma scoring a blistering 73 runs in their Twenty 20 match against Delhi Daredevils in New Delhi today.

item.title: Sachin-is-India-s-Don-Bradman-Hayden
item.description: Sachin Tendulkar has always been showered with the biggest of compliments but former Australia opener Matthew Hayden took it to a new level when he called the senior Indian batsman India's Don Bradman and a "movement in himself".
item.itunes:subtitle: Sachin Tendulkar has always been showered with the biggest of compliments but former Australia opener Matthew Hayden took it to a new level when he called the senior Indian batsman India's Don Bradman and a "movement in himself".
item.itunes:summary: Sachin Tendulkar has always been showered with the biggest of compliments but former Australia opener Matthew Hayden took it to a new level when he called the senior Indian batsman India's Don Bradman and a "movement in himself".

item.title: Serena-pulls-US-level-with-Sweden-in-Fed-Cup
item.description: World No. 1 Serena Williams cruised past Johanna Larson 6-2, 6-2 on Saturday to pull the United States level with Sweden at 1-1 in their Fed Cup World Group playoff.
item.itunes:subtitle: World No. 1 Serena Williams cruised past Johanna Larson 6-2, 6-2 on Saturday to pull the United States level with Sweden at 1-1 in their Fed Cup World Group playoff.
item.itunes:summary: World No. 1 Serena Williams cruised past Johanna Larson 6-2, 6-2 on Saturday to pull the United States level with Sweden at 1-1 in their Fed Cup World Group playoff.

item.title: Six-goal-rout-perfect-boost-for-Barca-clash
item.description: Germany goalkeeper Manuel Neuer said Bayern Munich's 6-1 Bundesliga rout of Hanover was the perfect preparation for Tuesday's Champions League semi-final, first leg against Barcelona.
item.itunes:subtitle: Germany goalkeeper Manuel Neuer said Bayern Munich's 6-1 Bundesliga rout of Hanover was the perfect preparation for Tuesday's Champions League semi-final, first leg against Barcelona.
item.itunes:summary: Germany goalkeeper Manuel Neuer said Bayern Munich's 6-1 Bundesliga rout of Hanover was the perfect preparation for Tuesday's Champions League semi-final, first leg against Barcelona.

item.title: Sharapova-begins-French-Open-build-up-in-Stuttgart
item.description: World number two Maria Sharapova returns to the Stuttgart tournament as title-holder as the Russian number one begins her claycourt preparations ahead of her defence of the French Open.
item.itunes:subtitle: World number two Maria Sharapova returns to the Stuttgart tournament as title-holder as the Russian number one begins her claycourt preparations ahead of her defence of the French Open.
item.itunes:summary: World number two Maria Sharapova returns to the Stuttgart tournament as title-holder as the Russian number one begins her claycourt preparations ahead of her defence of the French Open.

item.title: Touching-40-yet-insatiable
item.description: As Sachin Tendulkar approaches another birthday, cricketers salute the Master Blaster for his incredible talent and undiminished drive to excel.

item.title: Tiny-Amit-breaks-India-s-gold-drought
item.description: Female grapplers give a good account of themselves by winning two bronze to swell hosts’ tally to four.

item.title: For-us-Sir-used-for-Jadeja-is-in-Hindi-jokes-Dhoni
item.description: As the twitter fraternity waits for Mahendra Singh Dhoni's next installment of 'Sir Ravindra Jadeja' jokes, the Chennai Super Kings captain showed his witty side at the post-match presentation stating that the reference of 'Sir' is in Hindi.
item.itunes:subtitle: As the twitter fraternity waits for Mahendra Singh Dhoni's next installment of 'Sir Ravindra Jadeja' jokes, the Chennai Super Kings captain showed his witty side at the post-match presentation stating that the reference of 'Sir' is in Hindi.  &n
item.itunes:summary: As the twitter fraternity waits for Mahendra Singh Dhoni's next installment of 'Sir Ravindra Jadeja' jokes, the Chennai Super Kings captain showed his witty side at the post-match presentation stating that the reference of 'Sir' is in Hindi.

item.title: Nadal-beats-Tsonga-to-reach-ninth-Month-Carlo-final
item.description: Eight-times champion Rafael Nadal defeated Frenchman Jo-Wilfried Tsonga 6-3 7-6 to reach the Monte Carlo Masters final on Saturday.
item.itunes:subtitle: Eight-times champion Rafael Nadal defeated Frenchman Jo-Wilfried Tsonga 6-3 7-6 to reach the Monte Carlo Masters final on Saturday.
item.itunes:summary: Eight-times champion Rafael Nadal defeated Frenchman Jo-Wilfried Tsonga 6-3 7-6 to reach the Monte Carlo Masters final on Saturday.

item.title: Rosy-Saturday-for-Rosberg-in-Bahrain
item.description: Germany’s Nico Rosberg looked forward to ‘kick-starting’ his season after seizing Mercedes’s second successive pole position in qualifying for the Bahrain Formula One Grand Prix on Saturday.
item.itunes:subtitle: Germany’s Nico Rosberg looked forward to ‘kick-starting’ his season after seizing Mercedes’s second successive pole position in qualifying for the Bahrain Formula One Grand Prix on Saturday.
item.itunes:summary: Germany’s Nico Rosberg looked forward to ‘kick-starting’ his season after seizing Mercedes’s second successive pole position in qualifying for the Bahrain Formula One Grand Prix on Saturday.

item.title: Hamilton-handed-five-place-grid-penalty-following-gearbox-change
item.description: Lewis Hamilton's hopes of a second successive pole position disappeared on Saturday when he was handed a five-place penalty on the Bahrain Grand Prix starting grid for an unscheduled gearbox change.
item.itunes:subtitle: Lewis Hamilton's hopes of a second successive pole position disappeared on Saturday when he was handed a five-place penalty on the Bahrain Grand Prix starting grid for an unscheduled gearbox change.
item.itunes:summary: Lewis Hamilton's hopes of a second successive pole position disappeared on Saturday when he was handed a five-place penalty on the Bahrain Grand Prix starting grid for an unscheduled gearbox change.

item.title: Alonso-fastest-in-final-practice-at-Bahrain
item.description: Ferrari driver Fernando Alonso recovered from a spin today to post the fastest lap in the third and final Formula One practice session for the Bahrain Grand Prix.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ferrari driver Fernando Alonso recovered from a spin today to post the fastest lap in the third and final Formula One practice session for the Bahrain Grand Prix.
item.itunes:summary: Ferrari driver Fernando Alonso recovered from a spin today to post the fastest lap in the third and final Formula One practice session for the Bahrain Grand Prix.

item.title: Wasim-urges-Pakistani-bowlers-to-be-aggressive
item.description: Legendary Pakistan paceman Wasim Akram on Saturday urged Pakistan's top fast bowlers to be aggressive and adapt to new rule changes in order to excel at the international level.
item.itunes:subtitle: Legendary Pakistan paceman Wasim Akram on Saturday urged Pakistan's top fast bowlers to be aggressive and adapt to new rule changes in order to excel at the international level.
item.itunes:summary: Legendary Pakistan paceman Wasim Akram on Saturday urged Pakistan's top fast bowlers to be aggressive and adapt to new rule changes in order to excel at the international level.

item.title: Cricketers-salute-Sachin-Tendulkar-ahead-of-his-40th-birthday
item.description: Approaching his 40th birthday, Sachin Tendulkar's "insatiable hunger and incredible talent" has fetched him glowing tributes from fellow cricketers who say the batting great's longevity and passion for the game can never be surpassed.

item.title: Prandelli-warns-Balotelli-to-be-calm
item.description: Italy head football coach Cesare Prandelli has warned striker Mario Balotelli that he will have to learn how to deal with provocation if he is to have a future in the sport.

item.title: Wax-Sachin-Tendulkar-greets-fans-at-Sydney-Cricket-Ground
item.description: Sachin Tendulkar has made an unscheduled appearance at the Sydney Cricket Ground as a life sized wax figure of the Indian batsman was unveiled in front of a throng of cricket fans.
item.itunes:subtitle: Sachin Tendulkar has made an unscheduled appearance at the Sydney Cricket Ground as a life sized wax figure of the Indian batsman was unveiled in front of a throng of cricket fans.
item.itunes:summary: Sachin Tendulkar has made an unscheduled appearance at the Sydney Cricket Ground as a life sized wax figure of the Indian batsman was unveiled in front of a throng of cricket fans.

item.title: Shane-Watson-quits-as-Australia-vice-captain
item.description: Allrounder Shane Watson has quit as Australia vice-captain, a month after being disciplined by team management and leaving the tour of India. Cricket Australia said today that Watson will relinquish his vice captaincy across all formats of the game.
item.itunes:subtitle: Allrounder Shane Watson has quit as Australia vice-captain, a month after being disciplined by team management and leaving the tour of India. Cricket Australia said today that Watson will relinquish his vice captaincy across all formats of the game.
item.itunes:summary: Allrounder Shane Watson has quit as Australia vice-captain, a month after being disciplined by team management and leaving the tour of India. Cricket Australia said today that Watson will relinquish his vice captaincy across all formats of the game.

item.title: Warner-and-Blazer-accused-of-fraud-by-CONCACAF
item.description: CONCACAF's former leaders Jack Warner and Chuck Blazer were slammed as "fraudulent in their management" of the soccer confederation's affairs by the head of the regional body's Integrity Committee on Friday.
item.itunes:subtitle: CONCACAF's former leaders Jack Warner and Chuck Blazer were slammed as "fraudulent in their management" of the soccer confederation's affairs by the head of the regional body's Integrity Committee on Friday.
item.itunes:summary: CONCACAF's former leaders Jack Warner and Chuck Blazer were slammed as "fraudulent in their management" of the soccer confederation's affairs by the head of the regional body's Integrity Committee on Friday.

item.title: Sunil-Gulati-elected-to-FIFA-executive-committee
item.description: Sunil Gulati, president of the United States Soccer Federation, was elected on Friday for a four-year term on the executive committee of FIFA. The vote took place at the CONCACAF in Panama City on Friday.
item.itunes:subtitle: Sunil Gulati, president of the United States Soccer Federation, was elected on Friday for a four-year term on the executive committee of FIFA. The vote took place at the CONCACAF in Panama City on Friday.
item.itunes:summary: Sunil Gulati, president of the United States Soccer Federation, was elected on Friday for a four-year term on the executive committee of FIFA. The vote took place at the CONCACAF in Panama City on Friday.

item.title: Staying-positive-will-bail-out-Delhi
item.description: Just as winning is a wonderful habit to inculcate, losing is debilitating. That's something I am sure the Delhi Daredevils will agree with. Despite possessing a strong side, the Daredevils have found it difficult to progress. A seemingly champion side all these years, they are fighting a battle more in the mind than on the field. Javagal Srinath writes.
